Translations.Text: suryuni mariyu dani enda saksiga
dani venuka vacce candruni saksiga
prakasince pagati saksiga
danini kram'mukune, ratri saksiga
akasam mariyu danini nirmincina ayana (allah) saksiga
bhumi mariyu danini vistarimpajesina ayana saksiga
manava atma mariyu danini tircididdina ayana saksiga
a taruvata ayane daniki dustatananni mariyu daivabhitini teliyajesadu
vastavaniki tana atmanu sud'dhaparacukunnavade saphaludavutadu
mariyu vastavaniki danini anaga drokkina vade viphaludavutadu
samud jati talabirusutananto (pravaktanu) asatyavadudavani tiraskarincindi; tamaloni parama dustudu (a duskaryam ceyataniki) lecinappudu
allah sandesaharudu (salih) varito: "I ada onte allah ku cendindi. Kabatti dinini (nillu) traganivvandi!" Ani annadu
ayina varu atani (salih) matanu abad'dhamani tiraskarincaru. Mariyu dani (a onte) venaka mokali naranni kosi, kuntidanni cesi camparu
Kabatti vari prabhuvu vari papaniki paryavasananga vari mida maha vipattunu pampi varandarini nasanam cesadu
mariyu ayana (allah) dani paryavasananni gurinci bhayapadaledu
kram'mukune ratri saksiga
prakasince pagati saksiga
mariyu, maga mariyu ada (jatulanu) srstincina ayana (allah) saksiga
vastavaniki, mi prayatnalu nana vidhaluga unnayi
kani evadaite (danadharmalu) cestu daivabhiti kaligi untado
mariyu mancini nam'mutado
ataniki memu melu koraku darini sulabham cestamu
kani evadaite pisinaritanam cestu, nirlaksya vaikharini avalambistado
mariyu mancini abad'dhamani tiraskaristado
ataniki memu cedu koraku darini sulabham cestamu
mariyu atadu nasinci poyinappudu, atani dhanam ataniki ela upayogapadutundi
niscayanga, sanmargam cupadam ma pani
mariyu niscayanga, ihaparalokala (adhipatyam) make cendinadi
kabatti nenu mim'malni prajvalince narakagnini gurinci heccarincanu
